alert.note: Alert for Boone (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 19 at 2:02AM CDT until July 19 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Boone County in central Missouri... * Until 300 AM CDT. * At 202 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Midway, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Columbia, Ashland, Columbia Regional Airport, Rocheport, Murry, Midway, Hartsburg, Lupus, McBaine, and Wilton. This includes Interstate 70 in Missouri between exits 115 and 133. This also includes Rock Bridge State Park, Finger Lakes State Park, and Jewell Cemetery Historic Site. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
